Package org.bsc.bean

Interface Summary
BeanManager<T> It's an implementation of DAO interface (see DAO pattern ) for a jdbc data source to define a bean persistent model based on a extension of BeanInfo meta data
Examples:
Connection conn = open connection ...
DataAdapter Title: Bartolomeo Sorrentino Classi Description: Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001 Company: ITD
ManagedBeanInfo<T> define a bean info that expose the associated bean class property
ValueGenerator<T>  
 

Class Summary
AbstractBeanManager<T> This class provides a skeletal implementation of the BeanManager interface to minimize the effort required to implement this interface.
AbstractManagedBeanInfo<T> This is a support abstract class to make it easier for people to provide ManagedBeanInfo classes.
AggregateBeanManager<T> manage bean persistence operation on DB using BeanInfo and PropertyDescriptorField extention and support operations create, store and remove on the bean mapped on multiple table.
BaseBeanManagerFactory  
BeanDescriptorEntity BeanDescriptor extension for manage DataBase entity (TABLE,VIEW,STORED) and relations example: BeanDescriptorEntity _entity = new BeanDescriptorEntity(class name); _entity.setEntityName("entity name"); // create join relation _entity.createJoinRelation( "entity in relation", new JoinCondition("fieldA","fieldB"), new JoinCondition("fieldA","fieldC") ); OR _entity.createJoinRelation( "entity in relation", RIGHT_JOIN, new JoinCondition("fieldA","fieldB"), new JoinCondition("fieldA","fieldC") );
BeanDescriptorUtils  
BeanEnumeration<T> Title: Bartolomeo Sorrentino Classi Description: Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001 Company: ITD
BeanManagerFactory It's a implementation of DAO factory (see DAO pattern ) for create bean manager instances ( DAO interface ) You can extends this class to create a custom version of bean manager
BeanManagerMessages  
BeanManagerUtils Class utility Title: Bean Manager Description: ORM framework Copyright: Copyright (c) 2003 Company:
CustomJoinCondition  
DataBaseUtils Title: Bartolomeo Sorrentino Classi Class utility for db Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001 Company: ITD
DataBaseUtils.MySql class utility for MySql database
DataBaseUtils.SqlServer class utility for SQLServer database
JoinCondition Title: Bartolomeo Sorrentino Classi Description: Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001 Company: ITD
JoinRelations Title: Bartolomeo Sorrentino Classi Description: Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001 Company: ITD
ManagedBeanInfoProxy<T>  
PrimaryKey class for support of composite primary key
PropertyDescriptorField PropertyDescriptor extension for manage generic DataBase field PropertyDescriptorField _prop = new PropertyDescriptorField("propName", beanClass, "getpropName", "setpropName"); _prop.setFieldName("field name"); _prop.setSQLType( java.sql.Types.XXXXX );
PropertyDescriptorJoin property that identify a field joined with another table field PropertyDescriptorField _propID = new PropertyDescriptorField("propID", ... ); . . .
PropertyDescriptorPK property that identify a PrimaryKey field Default data type integer PropertyDescriptorPK _prop = new PropertyDescriptorPK("propName", beanClass, "getpropName", "setpropName"); _prop.setFieldName("field name"); _prop.setSQLType( java.sql.Types.XXXXX );
